summary: Remaps some keys to allow easy left/right hand weapon/magic assignment
descriptionHtml:
Altered version of http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=82

Description:  

   1) Binds \'[\' and \']\' (and \',\' and \'.\') to left and right hand equipping from the interface, respectively (does not affect quick menu, left and right mouse click are still also bound to equip left and right hands)
   2) Shouts can be used by either pressing \'Z\' or middle mouse button (mouse3)
   3) Every other key is default mapped

Desc. Extended: This remaps your keys to that you can press \'[\' or \',\' to equip an item in the left hand and \']\' or \'.\' to equip an item in the right hand. This is useful since on the PC version, left- and right-clicking sometimes doesn\'t work properly. It also allows you to press the middle mouse button to use your dragon shouts if you don\'t want to press \'Z\' (although \'Z\' still works as well).

Installation: Unpack to Skyrim main directory, make sure there is no ControlMap_Custom as it takes precedence over this file.
author: Dumbificate
